original_title: Yoga Journal – Complete Home Practice - Heart Wide Open by Amy Ippoliti
overview: Yoga Journal - the most trusted Yoga magazine in the world - is proud to present the Complete Home Practice 2 DVD set - it s your very own at-home yoga studio! Discover the joy of yoga through nine safe and easy-to-follow routines to improve your overall health. Taught by some of the world s most acclaimed instructors this collection is a convenient way to make yoga an integral part of your life...all from the comfort of your home.
title: Yoga Journal – Complete Home Practice - Heart Wide Open by Amy Ippoliti
